# configurationUpdateHandler

**Instance Property**

A block for handling updates to the cell’s configuration using the current state.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var configurationUpdateHandler: UICollectionViewCell.ConfigurationUpdateHandler? { get set }
```

## Discussion

A configuration update handler provides an alternative approach to overriding [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewCell/updateConfiguration(using:)] in a subclass. Set a configuration update handler to update the cell’s configuration using the new state in response to a configuration state change:

```swift
cell.configurationUpdateHandler = { cell, state in
    var content = UIListContentConfiguration.cell().updated(for: state)
    content.text = "Hello world!"
    if state.isDisabled {
        content.textProperties.color = .systemGray
    }
    cell.contentConfiguration = content
}
```

Setting the value of this property calls [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewCell/setNeedsUpdateConfiguration()]. The system calls this handler after calling [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewCell/updateConfiguration(using:)].

In iOS 18 and later, UIKit supports automatic trait tracking inside this closure for traits from this cell’s `traitCollection`. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/automatic-trait-tracking].
